A alquimia é o processo de desmontar e reconstruir um objeto em uma entidade diferente, com as regras da alquimia para governar este procedimento. No entanto, existe um objeto que pode trazer qualquer alquimista acima dessas regras, o objeto conhecido como Pedra Filosofal. O jovem Edward Elric é um alquimista particularmente talentoso que através de um acidente anos atrás perdeu seu irmão mais novo, Alphonse e uma de suas pernas. Sacrificar um de seus braços assim, ele usou a alquimia para ligar a alma de seu irmão a uma armadura. Поэтому, когда умерла мама, дети не отчаялись, а тотчас приступили к сложнейшему обряду — к преобразованию человека. Но это категорически запрещено! И, как оказалось, не напрасно. Цена за неудавшуюся попытку оказалась очень высока: у Альфонса забирают тело, а у Эдварда — ногу. В последний момент Эд отдаёт свою руку в обмен на возможность прикрепить душу Ала к доспеху. Вы думаете, что их жизни на этом закончились? Нет! Теперь у них есть другая цель — вернуть свои прежние тела. А что в мире алхимиков даёт возможность свершать любые преобразования? Featuring a collection of stand-alone stories where misunderstood heroines are accused of being frauds—only to reveal their true, divine power when it matters most.\n\nFrom broken engagements and banishments to unlikely romances and holy vengeance, each tale proves that being underestimated might just be the first step to rewriting your destiny.\n\nCover art: Ouka Mai\n\n+++**Volume 1 Contents:**  \n1. \"It Seems I'm the Saint, but I'll Accept Exile If That's What You Wish\" (どうやら私が聖女なのですが、望み通り追放されてあげようと思います。, \"Douyara Watashi ga Seijo na no desu ga, Nozomidoori Tsuihousarete Ageyou to Omoimasu\").  Art by Odayaka, Story by sasasa. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0299hy/)\n2. \"My Engagement Was Cancelled on the Grounds That I'm a Fake Saint, but I Was Never a Saint to Begin With, I Was Merely a Substitute Saint\" (偽聖女という理由で婚約破棄されましたが元々聖女ではなく代理聖女です, \"Nise Seijo to Iu Riyuu de Konyaku Hakisaremashita ga Motomoto Seijo de wa Naku Dairi Seijo desu\").  Art by Azuma Midori, Story by Kousha. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6533gu/)\n3. \"Eh? The Saint Isn't My Elder Sister but Me?\" (え？　姉じゃなくて私が聖女だったんですか？, \"E? Ane Janakute Watashi ga Seijo Dattan desu ka?\"). Art by Nain Yurie, Story by Haruna Don. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2461gm/)\n4. \"Since My Fiancé's Mistress Came to Confess Her Sins, I Decided to Condemn Them Both at Once\" (婚約者の浮気相手が懺悔しにやってきたので、まとめて断罪することにしました, \"Konyakusha no Uwaki Aita ga Zangeshi ni Yattekita no de, Matomete Danzai suru Koto shimashita\"). Art by Ayase Kyouna, Story by Nanase Yuyu. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8857hc/)\n5. \"The Abandoned Saint Who Devours Spirits Receives Excessive Love From the Bloody Duke\" (捨てられた邪気食い聖女は、血まみれ公爵様に溺愛される, \"Suterareta Jakigui Seijo wa, Chimamire Koushaku-sama ni Dekiaisareru\"). Art by Kuroma, Story by Kurusu Mikan. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7674hx/)\n+++\n+++**Volume 2 Contents:**  \n1. \"While I Was Dedicating Myself Wholeheartedly to Bestowing Blessings to Protect the Kingdom as a Saint, I Received Word That the Prince — My Fiancé — Was Holding a Wedding Ceremony\" (聖女として国を守るためにせっせと加護を施していたら＂婚約者の王子が結婚式を挙げている＂との知らせが入ったのですが). Art by Tomizuki Ichino, Story by Tsuki. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6682hx/)\n2. \"I'm Just a Simple Traveling Performer, but It Seems I'm Actually the Saint\" (しがない旅芸者なのですが、どうやら私が聖女だったようです). By 鳥居ナキ.\n3. \"Twin Saints: My Sister Wants Everything I Have, She Even Took My Fiancé\" (双子聖女〜妹が私の物ばかり欲しがります。ついには婚約者まで取られました〜). Art by Haruyama, Story by Misora Riwa. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0643hq/)\n4. \"The Killer Decided to Run Away With the Fake Saint\" (殺し屋は偽物聖女と逃げることにした). Art by Yuzumoto, Story by Amabana Maru. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1634hn/)\n5. \"Because of the Panacea, I Was No Longer Considered Necessary as a Saint. I Apologize, I'm Also the One Who Invented the Panacea\" (万能薬のせいで聖女の私は不要になりました。……ごめんなさい、その万能薬を作ったのも私です。). Art by Uyuna, Story by CK. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4118hx/)\n+++\n+++**Volume 3 Contents:**  \n1. \"Your Highness, I Am the One You Cast out for Not Being Holy, yet in Truth, I Am Beloved of the Gods\" (殿下、あなたが神々しくないと追放した私が神の愛し子です。). Art and story by Nakakura Chikage, Character design by Ouka Mai.\n2. \"'True Love' of the Saint\" (聖女の『真実の愛』). Art by Shiina Akuru, Story by Kurogi Mei. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9723gt/)\n3. \"The Saint Whose Engagement Was Broken and Is Now Free Longs to Experience the Love Marriage She's Always Dreamed of. Her Goal Is to Become a 'Super-Sweet Dumb Couple' Which Outshines the Prince and the Baron's Daughter\" (婚約破棄されて自由の身になった聖女さまは、憧れの恋愛結婚をしてみたい。目標は殿下と男爵令嬢をこえるスーパーバカップルになってやることです。). Art by 森野リエタ, Story by Ishikawa Midori. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1609hx/)\n4. \"The Banished Saint Picks up a Collapsed Person\" (追放聖女、行き倒れを拾う). Art by Asahi Machi, Story by Kusaba no Kage. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6229ic/)\n5.  (踊り子聖女は嵐に舞う). Art by Niiya Rin, Story by Bandou Tarou.\n+++\n+++**Volume 4 Contents:**\n1. \"I Have Reincarnated as a Fake Saint on the Verge of Condemnation: Flip Everything to Survive\" (今から断罪されそうな偽聖女に転生してしまった～すべてをひっくり返して生き残れ～). Art by 白良木羅々, Story by Kurusu Mikan. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9482io/)\n2. \"I Was Falsely Accused of Being a 'Fake Saint' and Exiled From the Country. While Living Peacefully in a Neighbouring Nation, I Received a Wedding Invitation From My Former Fiancé, the Prince\" (偽聖女と断罪されて国外追放になり、隣国で静かに暮らしていたら、元婚約者の王子から結婚式の招待状が届きました). Art by Ooba Fumi, Story by Asazuki Asa. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6508ie/)\n3. \"The Summoning of the Saint to Be Wed to the Poison King\" (召喚聖女は毒の王へ嫁がされる). Art by 鱧永あるひ, Story by Tenki Dou. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6853il/)\n4. \"After Being Stained With the Disgrace of Being a False Saint and Having Her Engagement Broken off by the Crown Prince, the Rainbow Saint Is Engaged Again\" (偽聖女の汚名を着せられ王太子に婚約破棄を言い渡された、虹の聖女は再び求婚される). Art by Asahi Machi, Story by Azuazu. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8284hv/)\n5. 国を追い出された元聖女ですが、黒豹陛下に溺愛されていたようです. Art by SASAKI Aoko, Story by Y. Himawari. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4989id/)\n6. 虐げられた聖女の能力は幸福に比例します. Art by Akatsuki Mikka, Story by Izumi (和泉). [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1082id/)\n+++\n+++**Volume 5 Contents:**\n1. 追放聖女は辺境で笑う. Art by 常盤あお, Story by Oki Iroha. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1575jd/)\n2. 追放された元聖女ですが、マジで偽聖女だったので助かりました。 Art by Areito, Story by Tentsubu. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4520jf/)\n3. 追放されたやさぐれ聖女はイケオジ公爵に溺愛される～元婚約者と祖国なんぞ知るか！～. Art by 織部とき, Story by Kowa Yuu. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0069hz/)\n4. 追放聖女と闇の契り〜妹にすべてを奪われた偽聖女。今更謝っても遅いです～. Art by Urita Nohito, Story by Manatsu. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4477gz/)\n5. 意地悪な姉が聖女らしいので、私は悪役令嬢になります！ Art by 森野リエタ, Story by Hanasaka Tsugumi.\n6. 不眠症に悩まされる女嫌いの公爵は訳アリ歌姫の声じゃないと眠れない～追放された聖女の契約婚～. Art by 蓑原みつき, Story by Rittan. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7525ja/)\n+++","ja":"ゼロサム“聖女”アンソロジーより新シリーズ登場！\nなんで聖女（わたし）がこんな目に～～っ！？\n「小説家になろう」掲載、聖女の魅力たっぷりな人気読み切り5本を収録!!\n\nカバーイラスト：桜花舞\n\n+++**第巻1の内容：**\n1. 『どうやら私が聖女なのですが、望み通り追放されてあげようと思います。』　漫画：おだやか　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0299hy/)：sasasa\n自由を欲した少女は、もう一人の候補者を聖女に仕立てあげて…？\n2. 『偽聖女という理由で婚約破棄されましたが元々聖女ではなく代理聖女です』　漫画：アズマミドリ　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6533gu/)：公社\n偽聖女であるとして婚約破棄を宣言された私。そもそも代理聖女です！\n3. 『え？　姉じゃなくて私が聖女だったんですか？』　漫画：奈院ゆりえ　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2461gm/)：榛名丼\n家族に虐げられた少女の目の前に現れたのは、王家の使いという男性で…？\n4. 『婚約者の浮気相手が懺悔しにやってきたので、まとめて断罪することにしました』　漫画：綾瀬きょうな　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8857hc/)：七瀬ゆゆ\n神と民の橋渡しをする大聖女の元に婚約者の浮気相手が現れ…!?\n5. 『捨てられた邪気食い聖女は、血まみれ公爵様に溺愛される』　漫画：黒間　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7674hx/)：来須みかん\n邪気を取り込み浄化する能力を持つ聖女は、血まみれ公爵の元へ追いやられ――。\n+++\n+++**第巻2の内容：**\n1. 『聖女として国を守るためにせっせと加護を施していたら＂婚約者の王子が結婚式を挙げている＂との知らせが入ったのですが』　漫画：冨月一乃　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6682hx/)：月\n最果ての地で無償で働いていたら、婚約者が結婚式を挙げていると聞いて——!?\n2. 『しがない旅芸者なのですが、どうやら私が聖女だったようです』　漫画：鳥居ナキ\n旅芸者の少女が、ある日突然、聖女選定の儀式に召喚され…!?\n3. 『双子聖女〜妹が私の物ばかり欲しがります。ついには婚約者まで取られました〜』　漫画：はる山　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0643hq/)：海空里和\n婚約者も聖女の功績も妹に奪われる日々。諦めていた私を救ってくれたのは…？\n4. 『殺し屋は偽物聖女と逃げることにした』　漫画：ゆずもと　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1634hn/)：雨花まる\n教会から追い出された無垢で無知な少女が出会ったのは、獣人の殺し屋でした——。\n5. 『万能薬のせいで聖女の私は不要になりました。……ごめんなさい、その万能薬を作ったのも私です。』　漫画：うゆな　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4118hx/)：CK\n万能薬があるから聖女の私とは婚約破棄!? そんなの勝手すぎます！\n+++\n+++**第3巻の内容：**\n1. 『殿下、あなたが神々しくないと追放した私が神の愛し子です。』　漫画：仲倉千景　キャラクター原案：桜花舞\n「神々しくないから偽者」という理由で追放された聖女に会いに来たのは変な魔術師!?\n2. 『聖女の「真実の愛」』　漫画：椎名明　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9723gt/)：黒木メイ\n『真実の愛』の邪魔をしたという罪を被せられ王太子から婚約破棄された聖女は――？\n3. 『婚約破棄されて自由の身になった聖女さまは、憧れの恋愛結婚をしてみたい。目標は殿下と男爵令嬢をこえるスーパーバカップルになってやることです。』　漫画：森野リエタ　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1609hx/)：石河翠\n婚約破棄を受けて恋愛解禁を求めた聖女のバカップルごっこの相手は王弟殿下――!?\n4. 『追放聖女、行き倒れを拾う』　漫画：あさひまち　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6229ic/)：クサバノカゲ \n冤罪により王都から追放された聖女は、辺境の村で衰弱した青年と出会い――。\n5. 『踊り子聖女は嵐に舞う』　漫画：新矢りん　原作：坂東太郎\n追放された踊り子聖女は侯爵家子息と一緒に旅に出ると決めて――!?\n+++\n+++**第巻4の内容：**\n1. 『今から断罪されそうな偽聖女に転生してしまった～すべてをひっくり返して生き残れ～』　漫画：白良木羅々　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9482io/)：来須みかん\n断罪イベント中に前世を思い出したけれど、この後に迎えるのは「断罪イベント返し」!?\n2. 『偽聖女と断罪されて国外追放になり、隣国で静かに暮らしていたら、元婚約者の王子から結婚式の招待状が届きました』　漫画：大羽ふみ　[原作]：朝月アサ\n偽聖女だと追放した元婚約者から 彼の結婚式に来るよう要求されて――!?\n3. 『召喚聖女は毒の王へ嫁がされる』　漫画：鱧永あるひ　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6853il/)：天樹堂\n聖女として召喚されたのに、厄介払いのように 『毒の王』の元へ送られて――。\n4. 『偽聖女の汚名を着せられ王太子に婚約破棄を言い渡された、虹の聖女は再び求婚される』　漫画：あさひまち　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8284hv/)：あずあず\nライバル視する令嬢の計略で、天候を操る 『虹の聖女』に婚約破棄が言い渡され――!?\n5. 『国を追い出された元聖女ですが、黒豹陛下に溺愛されていたようです』　漫画：笹木あおこ　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4989id/)：Y.ひまわり\nすべてを奪われた上、獣人の国へ嫁ぐよう 王命を下され――!?\n6. 『虐げられた聖女の能力は幸福に比例します』　漫画：あかつき三日　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1082id/)：和泉\n搾取されることしか知らなかった無垢な少女は 森でとある男性に出会い――。\n+++\n+++**第巻5の内容：**\n1. 『追放聖女は辺境で笑う』　漫画：常盤あお　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1575jd/)：沖いろは\n濡れ衣からその地位を剥奪された元・聖女は、のどかな地を治める辺境伯の手を取り――。\n2. 『追放された元聖女ですが、マジで偽聖女だったので助かりました。』　漫画：あれいと　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4520jf/)：てんつぶ\n顔だけの聖女だと追放されたので、自由な生活と美味しい料理を求めて旅に出ることに…！\n3. 『追放されたやさぐれ聖女はイケオジ公爵に溺愛される～元婚約者と祖国なんぞ知るか！～』　漫画：織部とき　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0069hz/)：琴葉悠\n偽聖女だと追放された先で偶然助けた相手は、顔良し性格良し身分良しのイケオジで――!?\n4. 『追放聖女と闇の契り〜妹にすべてを奪われた偽聖女。今更謝っても遅いです～』　漫画：瓜田ノヒト　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4477gz/)：真夏\n光の魔法に選ばれたのに、判定間違いだったと陥れられ追放された聖女は復讐を誓い――。\n5. He spots a young girl, Kilico Sakaki, at the scene of the crime and instinctively knows that she did it. After a bloody fight, Akira arrests her. Trained as a professional assassin by her stepfather, Toshio Sakaki, in everyday life, Kilico acts like an ordinary college student. Her arrest is treated as a mistake when she manages to hide all evidence of Shinichi's murder. Akira's subsequent investigation of Kilico runs into difficulty when he finds that it's too big for a police detective to handle. Her encounter with Akira makes Kilico remember her terrible past and have doubts about being an assassin. Kilico goes to Taiwan to train as a jewel connoisseur, the Sakaki family's legitimate business, behind which they hide all their illegitimate business. Fired for taking his investigation too far, Akira follows Kilico to Taiwan. The two meet again and become very close, as they get involved in the internal conflicts within the Tenrenban gang, Taiwan's biggest Mafia group."},"links":{"al":"31132","ap":"kilico","kt":"2433","mal":"1132","mu":"2840"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}}]}

ddd58edf-a79d-4cc3-bf4b-6f72feb21d3d:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"ddd58edf-a79d-4cc3-bf4b-6f72feb21d3d","title":{"en":"Fate/stay night - Der Held einer Kamelie (Doujinshi)"},"altTitles":[{"en":"(C87) Der Held einer Kamelie (Fate/stay night)"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIdds":["21f5800a-13b8-44f1-8e50-3cff94f1397d"],"description":{"en":"A day in the life, or something.  \n  \nFlowers language:  \n||  \nCamellias - generally, camellia flowers are used to express strong positive emotions, and are associated with feelings of love, affection, and admiration. In ancient Korea (around 1200 BC), they used to be displayed at weddings, because they signified the ideas of \"faithfulness\" and \"longevity\", that are crucial for having a successful marriage. Camellias are often given to people that are most important in one's life - lovers, close friends and family.  \n  \n- White camellias communicate deep admiration, and can also symbolize perfection. Offered to the deceased, they can reflect peaceful mourning, and outside of Japan (where because of their connection to the concept of \"divinity\", and by indirect association, \"spirituality\" - as in \"something that is not of / doesn't belong to material world\" - gifting them to still breathing person can be considered an expression of ill will), they can also be given to the living as a genuine wish for good luck and fortune to reach them.  \n  \n- Pink camellias symbolize heartfelt longing, and are perfect for couples in long distance relationships. They convey sincere need for another's presence in one's life, and while it isn't advised, bouquet of those flowers can be used as somewhat \"safe\" (ambiguity) declaration of romantic intent between friends.  \n  \n- Red camellias express romantic love, desire, deep passion and symbolize excellence (or recognition and admiration of such quality in an individual).  \n  \nSome say that last two varieties combined together send stronger message than red flowers alone, in something akin to saying \"I hold you dearest and can't stand to be parted from you\". In context of the story, this could also be translated to \"I want to be like / Can't wait to become (as strong/skilled/great) as you\".  \n  \n-  \n  \nLilies - what they mean is strongly dependent not only on type (color) of the flower, but also the kind of relationship individual has with a person.  \n  \nThat said, white lilies in particular are almost uniformly connected to the concepts of \"virtue\" and \"purity\". When offered to the deceased, they're expression of a wish for departed soul to attain peace, and for it to regain the state of innocence (as in absolvement of sin, evil, worries etc.).||"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b13b2a48-c720-44a9-9c77-39c9979373fb","name":{"en":"Doujinshi"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

dee213bf-e0b7-43a0-a542-6204c9b984d8:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"dee213bf-e0b7-43a0-a542-6204c9b984d8","title":{"en":"Soldier's Story"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Heitai-san Monogatari"},{"ja":"兵隊さん物語"}],"description":{"en":"A small shadow running around the battlefield is a \"soldier.\" He was given a military uniform and a steel helmet, and went left and right, passing through a hail of bullets to accomplish his mission! It's both sad and strong... This is the origin of Masahiro Nikaido's works, a fantastic first book that combines humor and pathos. Shotaro Ishinomori says, \"Even when the author was a magazine editor, he drew non-stop while waiting for manuscripts...The longer he waited for manuscripts, the more he enjoyed it.''He is probably the only editor in the world who said, \"The longer he waited for manuscripts, the more he enjoyed it.'' Wasn't it?\" A world of wild images condensed into one frame to two pages per work. Please enjoy a number of fantastic short nonsense."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/二階堂正宏-ebook/dp/B00K769S64/ref=tmm_kin_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8\u0026qid=\u0026sr=","bw":"deb92e7401-cdd8-4991-ad9e-373df7b03d92","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/729698/","mu":"k67tye8"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}}]}

Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos \"genjin\", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una \"inusual\" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.","fr":"Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.\n\nUn garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.\n\nLorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.\n\nLe nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.","ja":"ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――\n\n多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。\n\n「…人間って大変だぁ～」\n\n日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。","pl":"Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.\n\nPewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.\n\nKiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.","pt-br":"Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.\n\nUm menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos \"Genjin\" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.\n\nQuando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana \"incomum\" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.\n\nO novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.","ru":"Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. \"Нелюди\" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. \"Гендзины\" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие \"гендзины\", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.","vi":"Thời hiện đại trong câu chuyện này là thời đại của \"đa dạng\" giống loài, những chủng tộc bán nhân có một tên gọi mới là\"Genjin\" và sống cùng nền văn minh con người. Die eine Methode dafür dauert 60 Jahre, eine andere nur drei... aber das bedeutet eine Heirat mit Kilian selbst, der durch drei Jahre Ehe den Titel des Herzogs erben wird. Which choice will Daisy make?\n\nA marriage of convenience develops between Daisy, who is a baron's daughter, and the Marquis. The conditions of the contract are simple. No affection or love allowed, must work together as one, and guaranteed divorce three years later. Most importantly, do not do anything that can make the other fall in love.\n\nAfter pathetically drowning to death, Daisy goes back in time and now with her second life, she has one simple wish: to achieve happiness. Will she be able to fulfill it by Killian's side?\n\n---\nSweet, timid Daisy meets a tragic end after being betrayed by the man she loves. When she is given a second chance at life, she vows not to repeat the same mistakes of the past! The only problem is that she must pay off her father’s gambling debt to Kilian, an aristocrat with a terrifying reputation. One option will take her 60 years, and the other, just three... but it involves a contract marriage to Kilian, who must be three years married in order to inherit the title of duke. While Daisy has sworn off men, the conditions of the offer are too good to pass up. She will be paid a generous amount of money at the end of the contract and also be guaranteed a swift divorce. Is she making a mistake by putting her trust in another man? Or will this deal give her the wings she needs to fly?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8D%B0%EC%9D%B4%EC%A7%80-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EC%9D%98-%ED%98%BC%EC%95%BD%EC%9E%90%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%B2%95/2632), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54867617)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/daisy-how-become-dukes-fiancee/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/10194/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E4%BE%AF%E7%88%B5%E8%88%87%E6%88%91%E7%9A%84%E7%B5%90%E5%A9%9A%E6%A2%9D%E4%BB%B6/174)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/daisy-how-become-dukes-fiancee-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/daisy-how-become-dukes-fiancee-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Daisy-Cara-Menjadi-Tunangan-Duke/194)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/26953)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%8B%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88_%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%81/121)\n\n[Official English Novel Translation](https://radishfiction.com/stories/18008)","es":"Cásate por tres años y obtén 5 mil millones y 60 años sin pagar ¿Cuál es la elección de Daisy?\n\n\"Conseguiré un trabajo como esposa del Duque por un contrato. Seré una buena compañera\". Las reglas del contrato son simples. Casarse, pero esta prohibo el afecto. Un divorcio rápido garantizado después de 3 años. Nunca prohibas algo a tu esposo.\n\n\"Los hombres de mi familia se especializan en asesinatos políticos.\"\n\nDaisy vivió una vida desafortunada en su vida anterior. Una pobre mujer que tenía una vida arruinada y murió miserablemente. Su único deseo era no regresar a su vida anterior a la muerte y vivir una segunda vida, disfrutando de la felicidad ordinaria y trivial. ¿Puede Daisy pedir ese deseo?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8D%B0%EC%9D%B4%EC%A7%80-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EC%9D%98-%ED%98%BC%EC%95%BD%EC%9E%90%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%B2%95/2632), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54867617)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/daisy-how-become-dukes-fiancee/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/10194/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E4%BE%AF%E7%88%B5%E8%88%87%E6%88%91%E7%9A%84%E7%B5%90%E5%A9%9A%E6%A2%9D%E4%BB%B6/174)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/daisy-how-become-dukes-fiancee-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/daisy-how-become-dukes-fiancee-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Daisy-Cara-Menjadi-Tunangan-Duke/194)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/26953)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%8B%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88_%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%81/121)\n\n[Official English Novel Translation](https://radishfiction.com/stories/18008)","fr":"Alors que la douce et timide Daisy, trahie par l’homme de sa vie, connaît une mort des plus tragiques, une seconde chance s’offre à elle, lui permettant de remonter dans le temps. Bien décidée à changer son destin, elle se jure alors de ne pas répéter les erreurs qu’elle a commises dans le passé. Le seul problème, c’est qu’elle doit rembourser les dettes de son père à Kilian, un aristocrate à la réputation terrifiante. Parmi les options qui s'offrent à elle, l’une prendra 60 ans et l’autre, trois. La seconde option semble donc un choix évident… mais elle implique un contrat de mariage avec Kilian, qui doit avoir été marié trois ans pour pouvoir hériter du titre de Duc. Même si Daisy a déjà renoncé aux hommes, les conditions de cette offre sont assez alléchantes. Non seulement elle se verra offrir une généreuse somme d’argent à l’issue du contrat, mais elle bénéficiera aussi d’un divorce rapide et facile. Daisy commettra-t-elle une erreur en mettant à nouveau sa confiance entre les mains d’un homme? Ou bien ce marché donnera-t-il enfin des ailes à sa vie?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8D%B0%EC%9D%B4%EC%A7%80-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EC%9D%98-%ED%98%BC%EC%95%BD%EC%9E%90%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%B2%95/2632), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54867617)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/daisy-how-become-dukes-fiancee/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/10194/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E4%BE%AF%E7%88%B5%E8%88%87%E6%88%91%E7%9A%84%E7%B5%90%E5%A9%9A%E6%A2%9D%E4%BB%B6/174)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/daisy-how-become-dukes-fiancee-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/daisy-how-become-dukes-fiancee-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Daisy-Cara-Menjadi-Tunangan-Duke/194)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/26953)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%8B%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88_%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%81/121)\n\n[Official English Novel Translation](https://radishfiction.com/stories/18008)","ru":"Дэйзи - средняя дочь в семье обедневшего аристократа. dfabad2b-10be-4f16-b779-7746e095d832:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"dfabad2b-10be-4f16-b779-7746e095d832","title":{"en":"Seirei Gensouki ~Konna Sekai de Deaeta Kimi ni~"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Mythical Spirit Chronicle ~This Is the World Where I Met You~"},{"ja":"精霊幻想記 ～こんな世界で出会えた君に～"},{"ja":"精霊幻想記"},{"ja":"Seirei Gensouki"}],"lastChapter":"3","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIds":["c101b7dd-1e3f-4563-8ef9-be69cf367129"],"description":{"en":"Amakawa Haruto is a young man who died before reuniting with his childhood friend who disappeared five years ago. Two people with completely different backgrounds and values. For some reason, the memories and personality of Haruto who should’ve died is resurrected in Rio’s body.
